author: aRTie
lore: Unwanted, Superfluous... nothing more than a glitch.
No body to call your own. No place for you in this or any other world.
You will never have a home, a life to call your own.
You will but wither, fade out of existence.
You still wish to cling to you conscience?
Well, who am I to stop you.
Just know that you've been warned though. There is no happy end for you.
